title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: It started as a sprog, brekin in tae help auld girls that hud forgot thair keys n shut thirsels oot. Then came the time ma auld man telt us his mate wis locked oot the hoose, pointin up tae a tenement flat at the back ay Burlington Street. 'Climb up thaire, Danny, that windae, perr Freddy here's loast his keys, eh,' the auld boy goes, lookin at his mate standin wi a glum pus.
